§ Koho Busines Cards (Koho Story)

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

⸺ published 2016-05-02T14:35:13-07:00

**Scott Bell** designed the Koho business cards to look like credi cards — I thought that was both fitting and clever 🙂

They are even made out of plastic (rather than some type of paper, like most business cards).

I have had many business cards over the decades — but this is the first //plastic// business card I have had.

Charles Iliya Krempeaux is the founding //chief technology officer// (CTO) of //Koho Financial// — a Canadian fintech company that provides banking services.
From 2015 to 2018 he worked on Koho.
He figured out how to build a //bank// — and built one //from scratch//.
This is the [[koho]] story from his point-of-view.
